text:
Join us on Tuesday 26th Feb to Kickstart your Career in China!

Come and hear from experts who are based in Greater China for the latest news about graduate jobs in China. This careers seminar will be of interest to students seeking employment in the financial services sector, accounting and other sectors of the Chinese economy.

About CPA Australia:
CPA Australia is one of the world's largest accounting bodies with a global membership of more than 160,000 members working in 125 countries and regions around the world. 
Our core services to members include education, training, technical support and advocacy. Employees and members work together with local and international bodies to represent the views and concerns of the profession to governments, regulators, industries, academia and the general public.

Find out more and book here: https://buff.ly/2tnHVB2
